name: Tentative
description:
Escape the frozen horrors that you might or might not have awakened!

WASD - Move

Leftclick - Use grapple

Different kinds of grappling are available:

Swing - You automatically let go, so better watch out!

Beam - You get drawn to your target in a linear fashion. But maybe you'd rather keep moving?

Auto-Grapple: The most comfortable way of travel! Just hold down the button, and reach your destination!
